definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Er2 tong2 Ji1 jin1 hui4

definition: Children's Day (June 1st), PRC national holiday for children under 14
Convention on the Rights of the Child (CRC)
pinyin: er2 tong2 quan2 li4 gong1 yue1

definition: to rescue a child/Save the Children, a British charity
"left-behind children", rural children whose parents have to make a living as migrant workers in distant urban areas, but cannot afford to keep the family with them

sentences.english: There is also a Children's Corner in our zoo.
sentences.chinese: 动物园里还有个儿童乐园。

sentences.english: In terms of overall child protection, the United States is certainly in the top echelon.
sentences.chinese: 从保护儿童的总体情况来看，美国肯定名列前茅。

sentences.english: Thinking structure in childhood in the development of the critical period.
sentences.chinese: 思维结构在儿童期处于发生发展的关键期。

sentences.english: Such as the need to occupy a separate seat, the child should be the purchase of tickets.
sentences.chinese: 如需要单独占用座位时，应购买儿童票。

sentences.english: Objective To make new approach of the interventional radiology in the treatment of ischemic necrosis of caput femoris in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨介入治疗儿童股骨头缺血性坏死的价值。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the clinical characteristics and treatment options of cutaneous vessel abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结儿童皮肤脉管异常的临床特点和治疗选择。

sentences.english: Gifted children can appear to have the same behaviours as those with Asperger's.
sentences.chinese: 天才儿童会出现一些与亚斯普杰氏症候群相同的行为。

sentences.english: MethodsBoth eyes of 68 children with leukocoria were examined with CT scan.
sentences.chinese: 方法对68例儿童白瞳症患者进行双眼CT扫描检查。

sentences.english: Communicate with orphanage directors and hospital staff.
sentences.chinese: 与儿童福利院院长及医院职员联络。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the needs of the families of hearing-impaired children.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解听障儿童家长对康复认知与需求情况。

sentences.english: Like all drugs，Miacalcic should be kept out of reach of children.
sentences.chinese: 与其他药物一样，密钙息应妥善保存，勿让儿童接触。

sentences.english: On October 12 two sick children arrived at the hospital in a vehicle from a nomad encampment.
sentences.chinese: 在10月12日有两名患病儿童从牧区乘车来到医院。

sentences.english: Patricia Neal raised money for children and adults who had suffered brain injuries.
sentences.chinese: 帕特里夏尼尔谁提出的儿童和成年人遭受脑损伤的钱。

sentences.english: Amazing Grass, Kidz Super Food, Outrageous Chocolate Flavor, 200g.
sentences.chinese: 儿童超级食物补充，无法抗拒的巧克力味，200克。

sentences.english: Flexible bronchoscope diagnosis and treatment of mycoplasma pneumonia in children.
sentences.chinese: 儿童支原体肺炎的纤维支气管镜诊治研究。

sentences.english: Children can't help fidgeting about if they're made to sit still for too long.
sentences.chinese: 儿童如果被迫久坐会情不自禁地把身体扭来扭去。

definition: child victim of disaster or disease/afflicted child
head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
